document_data.name: Pow Ming
document_data.mainbody: '''Pow Ming''' was a [[wizard]] who lived in [[Yartar]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Pow Ming acted as security chief of the [[Grand Dame]], a riverboat housing a gambling hall. She patrolled the cabin and monitored newer customers.
document_data.Personality: Pow was a truly [[neutral]] individual. Her goal was to join the [[Arcane Brotherhood]] and used her time at the Grand Dame to meet influential people that could help her in this objective.
